item.description:
I LOVE the Indiana Jones movies...and I haven't seen this one in far too long!

From www.indianajones.com:

The year is 1936. As the Third Reich continues its reign of terror, Adolph Hitler is on a quest for the legendary Ark of the Covenant - resting place of the Ten Commandments - whose supernatural powers, legend says, can wipe out entire armies.

The U.S. Goverment wants to find the Ark before Hitler, and Army Intelligence turns to Dr. Indiana Jones, professor of archaeology at a small New England college.
item.name: Raiders of the Lost Ark @ The Coolidge Corner Theatre!
